entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
